source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT top (10) ref_id, SAP_PO_NUM, SCM_Q_PO_NO, SCM_OPERATION_NO, 	
SCM_ORD_QTY_KG, SCM_ORD_QTY_PCS, SAP_BATCH_ID, BATCH_QTY, 	BATCH_PCS,PRODN_MACHINE, 
START_TIME, END_TIME, 	PRODN_REC_DATE,CREATE_DATE, ISNULL(MODIFY_DATE, GETDATE()) AS MODIFY_DATE, PRODN_ORDER_NO_SCH , PRODN_STATUS, NR_OF_OPERATION , product_type FROM 	STS.dbo.tbl_sts_scm_prodn_staging_upd_test 
WHERE REC_TYPE='A'  and (SAP_BATCH_ID like 'O%' or 
SAP_BATCH_ID like 'F%' or SAP_BATCH_ID like 'M%' 	or SAP_BATCH_ID like 'P%' or (SAP_BATCH_ID like 'A%' AND PRODN_STATUS <> 'G'))
